about_the_game:
Get ready for an epic snowball showdown! Dive into this fun-filled couch co-op snow-fighting game designed for up to 4 players on one screen. Whether you're dodging snowballs, landing perfect throws, or outmaneuvering your opponents, every match is packed with laughter and excitement!

Early Access

This game is still in development, and I, a solo developer, am thrilled to share it with you in early access! Your feedback means the world to me and will help shape the game into its best version. Please feel free to report any bugs, suggest ideas, or share your thoughts—good or bad! Every bit of feedback makes a difference and is deeply appreciated.

Key Features

  • Couch Co-Op Fun: Play with friends and family locally using controllers. Perfect for game nights!

  • Top-Down Perspective: Stay in the action with a clear bird’s-eye view of the snowy battleground.

  • Kids Mode: A special mode with auto-aim assistance and forgiving difficulty, making it fun and accessible for younger players.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Sprint, slide, and dodge your way to victory while unleashing perfectly timed snowball throws.

  • Various Game Modes: Keep the fun fresh with exciting ways to play.

  • Charming Visuals: Experience a vibrant, cartoon-style winter wonderland that brings the frosty fun to life.

Game Modes

  • Free-For-All: Every snowballer for themselves—last one standing wins!

  • King’s Crown: Race against time to earn points while wearing the crown! The crowned player scores extra points, but everyone else is out to take them down. Hold the crown the longest to win.

  • Last Penguin: Watch out for the fishy smell! A mischievous penguin with a bomb chases the smelly player. If it catches them, they explode! Avoid the stink and outlast your friends to win.

  • Campaign Mode: Face off against AI opponents in challenging scenarios and boss fights.

Perfect for All Ages

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for some casual fun. 

Grab a controller, gather your friends, and let the snowball battles begin!
